fee_info:
Overnight Use:
Group Site: $175 per night (1 -100 people)
Overnight Use: 1-100 people, $175 per night.
Overnight Use hours: 2:00 PM -11:00 AM.
Maximum capacity is 100 people. To request an early check in time, please call Paige Whitney, Assistant District Recreation Officer, at 530-934-1167.
directions: Arriving from the South, take the Lassen, Highway 36 exit at Red Bluff or coming from the Redding area heading South on I-5 take the Antelope Blvd - Lassen Highway 36 exit, there will be a Forest Service sign on right. Take the first road to the right which is Sale Lane (at the lights).

Single Site: $5 per night
$5 per vehicle
Another Way to Pay
:
Once on-site, you are able to pay for your campsite(s) by scanning the QR code on the campground kiosk using the
Recreation.gov
mobile app, and the Scan and Pay feature.
In order to utilize Scan & Pay on site, you will need to first download the free
Recreation.gov
mobile app
https://www.recreation.gov/mobile-app
prior to your arrival as some remote areas have limited or no cellular service.

fee_info:
Overnight Use:
Single Site: $16 per night
Double Site: $30 per night
Group Site: $30 per night (16 people max)
Expanded Site (Electric + Water): $25 per night
19 of these sites ( $16 per night), 1 double site ($30 per night), and 10 expanded sites, which include electricity & potable water ($25 per night ); all sites accept Senior and Access passes. One large family site ($30 per night) with tables & grills; up to 16 people at this site.
directions: Arriving from the South, take the Lassen, Highway 36 exit at Red Bluff or coming from the Redding area heading South on I-5 take the Antelope Blvd - Lassen Highway 36 exit, there will be a Forest Service sign on right. Take the first road to the right which is Sale Lane (at the lights).
